  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.client.network.ConnectionClientSocket

extends java.lang.Object
implements ConnectionClient, java.io.Serializable
    Class ConnectionClientSocket
    Author:
    Samuele Guida class that manage the network between client and server throws socket. Side Client
